data.title: Plymouth County Register of Probate
data.text:
Greetings! It is my great pleasure to serve the residents of Plymouth County as your elected Register of Probate. I hope this website will help you to learn more about the functions of the Probate and Family Court as well as some of the work we are doing in the Plymouth County Registerâ€™s Office to serve you and your family.

If you are seeking information about the Probate and Family Court, including but not limited to forms, judicial schedules and contact information for our staff and departments, you can visit the following resources; www.PlymouthCountyProbate.com, www.mass.gov, or call our office at (508) 747-6204.

For more regular updates about my work as Register, please follow me on Facebook at Plymouth County Register of Probate Matt McDonough.
